description: Sculpted Clyde & Manny enjoy a day in the sun by the harbor. They have fun kidding around as they prepare to get close and personal. Clyde’s watched every video that Manny’s ever made, well “almost every video,” says Clyde. Eager to fuck Manny’s tight ass, Clyde says “there’s a lot to be excited about.” He reaches out and grabs Manny’s chest admiring his “manly pecs.” “I was just groped and I liked it,” says Manny as he smiles flirtatiously. These two can’t wait to get tear each other’s clothes off!
title: Clyde & Manny: Bareback
